Sales Representative Job at OneFocus Consulting Service




        
    

        
        OneFocus Consulting Service - We are a leading human capacity development company focusing on staff management, traininngs and development, IT and Voluntary Work placement, and Recruitment. We are passionate about helping organizations get a structured work environment & grow sustainably.First we understand your organization’s need and then we provide tailor-made human resource solutions to help your business scale. 

We inspire and connect job seekers to job opportunities in Port Harcourt and its environs. Our services includes; Staff management, Organization and personal development trainings, recruitment, Career and EmployabilityMaster class, CV Review and writing.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Help pack and deliver customer orders when needed.
	Support in setting up tables or stands during market activations or pop-up events.
	Keep simple records of daily sales and customer requests.
	Learn about the products so you can explain them better to people.
	Politely remind customers about restocks, offers, or new arrivals.
	Work closely with the sales or store supervisor and follow instructions


Salary
N70,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@onefocus.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidates within close Proximity to Woji, Trans-amadi, Slaughter, Nkpogu, Odili road will be considered.

  "description": "CEO&#39;s Mart is a retail business located in Eleganza, Lekki, Lagos. It typically offers a wide range of products, including groceries, household items, and personal care products. The store aims to provide quality goods at competitive prices while ensuring a pleasant shopping experience for customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Floor Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a dedicated Supermarket Floor Supervisor to manage daily operations on the sales floor and develop strategies to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.
	The ideal candidate will lead the team, implement business strategies, and ensure the supermarket meets its sales objectives.


Job Responsibilities


	Oversee daily operations on the supermarket floor, ensuring a high standard of customer service and product availability.
	Supervise and train staff, promoting a positive work environment and encouraging teamwork.
	Monitor inventory levels and conduct stock audits to maintain optimal stock levels.
	Implement merchandising strategies and promotional campaigns to drive sales.
	Analyze sales data and customer feedback to identify areas for improvement and new opportunities.
	Champion initiatives to enhance the shopping experience and operational efficiency.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations and store policies.
	Collaborate with management to develop and implement business strategies that align with overall goals.
	Handle customer inquiries and complaints in a professional manner, ensuring customer satisfaction.


Qualifications


	High School Diploma or equivalent; a Degree in Retail Management or a related field is preferred.
	Previous experience in retail or supermarket operations, ideally in a supervisory role.
	Strong leadership and team management skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
	Proficient in inventory management and point-of-sale systems.
	Ability to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays.


Benefits


	Competitive salary (N100,000 Monthly)&nbsp;and performance bonuses.
	Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
	Employee discounts and other benefits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr.recruitmentnigeria23@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Posiiton as the subject of the mail.",

Supermarket Floor Supervisor Job at CEO's Mart




        
    

        
        CEO's Mart is a retail business located in Eleganza, Lekki, Lagos. It typically offers a wide range of products, including groceries, household items, and personal care products. The store aims to provide quality goods at competitive prices while ensuring a pleasant shopping experience for customers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supermarket Floor Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a dedicated Supermarket Floor Supervisor to manage daily operations on the sales floor and develop strategies to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.
	The ideal candidate will lead the team, implement business strategies, and ensure the supermarket meets its sales objectives.


Job Responsibilities


	Oversee daily operations on the supermarket floor, ensuring a high standard of customer service and product availability.
	Supervise and train staff, promoting a positive work environment and encouraging teamwork.
	Monitor inventory levels and conduct stock audits to maintain optimal stock levels.
	Implement merchandising strategies and promotional campaigns to drive sales.
	Analyze sales data and customer feedback to identify areas for improvement and new opportunities.
	Champion initiatives to enhance the shopping experience and operational efficiency.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations and store policies.
	Collaborate with management to develop and implement business strategies that align with overall goals.
	Handle customer inquiries and complaints in a professional manner, ensuring customer satisfaction.


Qualifications


	High School Diploma or equivalent; a Degree in Retail Management or a related field is preferred.
	Previous experience in retail or supermarket operations, ideally in a supervisory role.
	Strong leadership and team management skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
	Proficient in inventory management and point-of-sale systems.
	Ability to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays.


Benefits


	Competitive salary (N100,000 Monthly) and performance bonuses.
	Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.
	Employee discounts and other benefits.


Method of Application
